name: AP_CLAIM_PROC_4
description:
This table summarizes data for AP Claims service lines, with each service line given one row.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: REPRICED_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The allowed amount for the procedure that was received from the most recent repricer.

columns.name: REPRICED_DISALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The disallowed amount for the procedure that was received from the most recent repricer.

columns.name: UPN_CODE
columns.description: UPN (Universal Product Number) code for the procedure on a claim.

columns.name: UPN_QTY
columns.description: Quantity of UPN code for the procedure on a claim.

columns.name: UPN_DESC
columns.description: Description of the UPN code for the procedure on a claim.

columns.name: UPN_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Qualifier code of the UPN code for the procedure on a claim.

columns.name: UPN_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Unit of measurement for UPN code for the procedure on a claim.

columns.name: PAID_CLM_FILE_NOT_CVD_AMT
columns.description: The not covered amount from the claim's source file. This is only populated for externally-paid claims loaded from claims files.

columns.name: PAID_CLM_FILE_DEDUCT_AMT
columns.description: The deductible amount from the claim's source file. This is only populated for externally-paid claims loaded from claims files.

columns.name: PAID_CLM_FILE_COINS_AMT
columns.description: The coinsurance amount from the claim's source file. This is only populated for externally-paid claims loaded from claims files.

columns.name: PAID_CLM_FILE_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The copay amount from the claim's source file. This is only populated for externally-paid claims loaded from claims files.

columns.name: PAID_CLM_FILE_INS_AMT
columns.description: The insurance amount from the claim's source file. This is only populated for externally-paid claims loaded from claims files.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: Patient associated with the transaction.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the transaction record status.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT
columns.description: Amount used for computing benefits for limiting patient portion.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_FEE_SCHEDULE_MAP_ID
columns.description: Fee schedule map used for limiting patient portion.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_FEE_SCHEDULE_MAP_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_MAP_NAME
columns.description: The name for the fee schedule map record.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_FEE_SCHEDULE_ID
columns.description: Fee schedule used for limiting patient portion.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_FEE_SCHEDULE_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each fee schedule.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_NETWORK_LEVELS_C_NAME
columns.description: Network level used for limiting patient portion.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_SKIP_YN
columns.description: Whether to skip this service for limiting the patient portion.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: Network ID used for limiting patient portion.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: QUAL_AMT_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Override for the qualifying amount for computing benefits for limiting patient portion.

columns.name: INVOICE_EXTERNAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: The service line price that is manually entered by an end user based on an invoice or externally calculated amount.

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_DATE_TYPE_C
columns.description: The date type used when calculating timely filing (submission penalty).

columns.name: OVERRIDE_CONTRACTUAL_VALUE
columns.description: The override contractual allowed amount. This is only used in Adjudication review for display and calculations in pricing card.

columns.name: HIPPS_PROC_CODE
columns.description: Service-line HIPPS Code.

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE_PC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Service-line HIPPS Code Type. This qualifies the HIPPS Code to a Prospective Payment System (PPS).

columns.name: PRICER_MSG_ID
columns.description: The most recent Epic Pricer message record that was used to price the service.

columns.name: PRICER_DISTRIBUTION_AMT
columns.description: For HIPPS-based pricing, Epic Pricer will return a claim-level allowed amount. This amount is then distributed to Room & Board service lines, based on the billed amount.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_STOP_LOSS_CNCT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the contact date associated with the stop loss term record (NSL) that was used in determining the allowed amount of this service line.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_CMP_CNCT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the component record used to calculate the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_TIERED_CMP_INDEX_ID
columns.description: The CMP & CMG Index (CMI) record of the tiered component used to calculate the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_TIERED_CMP_INDEX_ID_COMPONENT_INDEX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component index record

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_TIERED_PX_LN
columns.description: The line of the matched tiered procedure used to calculate the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_PCT_USED
columns.description: The reimbursement percentage used to calculate timely filing (submission penalty).

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_CNTRCT_OR_PRFL
columns.description: Whether vendor contracts ("Contract") or the Tapestry Profile ("Profile") was used to calculate timely filing (submission penalty).

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_LAG_DAYS
columns.description: The difference in days between date received and date serviced for calculating timely filing (submission penalty).

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The discounted amount used in calculating timely filing (submission penalty).

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_RULE_ID
columns.description: The rule ID used if timely filing (submission penalty) setting was used and a rule was matched.

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_RULE_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the rule.

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_TMLY_FILE_YN
columns.description: Set to "Y" if timely filing (submission penalty) setting was used but no rule matched. Otherwise, set to "N".

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_CMG_LN
columns.description: The line of the component group used to calculate the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ADDL_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total additional adjustments that apply to the allowed amount on a service.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_DOWNCODED_PROC_ID
columns.description: The original HCPCS code that was downcoded by the EDC analyzer.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_DOWNCODED_QUAL_AMT
columns.description: Qualifying payment amount for the original code before it went through EDC downcoding.

columns.name: AUTH_REQ_YN
columns.description: Whether a service required authorization when it was last adjudicated.

columns.name: SUGGESTED_AUTH_FOUND_YN
columns.description: Whether a service found a suggested authorization when it was last adjudicated.

columns.name: IS_CONTRACT_CAPITATED_YN
columns.description: Whether the contract line matched to this service during adjudication has a service type of capitated.

columns.name: COMPUTED_PRIOR_INS_AMT
columns.description: Prior insurance amount computed based on the claim-level prior insurance amount and allocated to this service.

columns.name: COMPUTED_PRIOR_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: Prior patient portion computed based on the claim-level prior patient portion and allocated to this service.
